post.text: Crooked Hillary counts on Wall Street for donations.  I'll NEVER be bought and sold by them. My supporters are the BEST because they're every day Americans! Together, we WILL Make America Great Again!

comment.author: Dakota
comment.text: This is such a close race. My stomach turns every time I think about Clinton being President. I find it funny that people slander you for your honesty and back and praise Clinton for her constant lies and manipulation. You have to beat her in this election! You have my vote!

replies.author: Garrett
replies.text: Haha I feel the same way about Trump. He makes me sick.

replies.author: Casey
replies.text: So Trump makes you all sick? Then get off his Facebook page. Trump has got plans for America and making it great again. You all just focus on his tax returns,his ego and what he has done in the past. You just feed the love everyone has for him. If he doesn't win,then Crooked Hillary and the crooked Democrats win. I know there is Gary Johnson and Jill Stein,but they'll need some catching up to even bear the surface of the general election. Sp Trump is our best shot of turning America back in the right direction. If he loses,then we'll just be lost forever.

replies.author: Hadassa
replies.text: Your probably the same fool that said Obama will destroy our country. But here we are doing better than we have in a decade but you still don't see it. Never trump

replies.author: Dakota
replies.text: Hadassa yep I was. Do tell how we are better?
